content: The ground truth AEROPLANE region on the center of the scene has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the PERSON region on the bottom left is under-segmented. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the AEROPLANE region have been completely misclassified as AEROPLANE.
The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat coarser, less defined boundaries, and these tend to be slightly under-extended, especially on the bottom right.

The ground truth TRAIN region on the left and right has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the bottom. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as TRAIN.
The ground truth BOAT region on the right has been over-segmented, especially on the top. The ground truth BOAT region on the left has been over-extended towards the left.

The ground truth CHAIR region has been over-segmented as SOFA and POTTEDPLANT on the top of the scene. The ground truth DOG region has been under-segmented as CHAIR and POTTEDPLANT on the right and bottom of the scene.

The ground truth BIRD region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the bottom left. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as BACKGROUND.

The ground truth TVMONITOR regions on the top have been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The top right corner of the rightmost TVMONITOR region and the top left corner of the leftmost TVMONITOR region are especially flawed, with the BACKGROUND areas being misclassified as TVMONITOR.

The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries. The top and right boundaries of the region are especially flawed, with some BACKGROUND areas misclassified as TRAIN.

The ground truth BICYCLE region on the bottom has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the bottom left. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as BICYCLE. The ground truth PERSON region on the top has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the left. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as PERSON.

The ground truth PERSON region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top of the head and on the left side of the body. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as PERSON.

The ground truth SHEEP region has been segmented with somewhat inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top left and top right, where the BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been misclassified as BACKGROUND.

The ground truth TVMONITOR region on the left has been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries. The prediction mask hallucinates TVMONITOR regions on the right, where the ground truth is BACKGROUND.
The ground truth BOAT region on the center of the scene has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The top of the boat is over-segmented.
The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat coarser, less defined boundaries. The tail and the wings are especially flawed.

The ground truth BOTTLE region on the left of the scene has been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries. The BACKGROUND areas behind the candles have been misclassified as DININGTABLE. The DININGTABLE region around the candles has been over-extended.

The ground truth BIRD region on the right has been segmented with more accurate boundaries, especially on the wings. The prediction mask of the ground truth BIRD region on the right is incomplete.

The ground truth PERSON region on the top right of the scene has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as PERSON.

The ground truth COW region on the right has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as COW. The ground truth PERSON region on the left has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the COW areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as PERSON. The prediction mask is quite chaotic, many HORSE regions have been hallucinated all over the COW region.
The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries, especially on the top right of the train.
The prediction captured most of the ground truth CAT region, however, the bottom boundary of the region is slightly flawed.
The ground truth BUS region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top and on the left. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been misclassified as BUS.

The ground truth PERSON region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The prediction mask is missing some details on the left arm and leg, and there is a small hallucinated PERSON region on the top left.

Overall, the prediction captured most of the ground truth regions, however, the ground truth CAT region on the center of the scene has been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries, especially on the top.
